messages.message:
Hey team, I am currently working on updating our master to have Ubuntu@24.04 upgrade and I am facing issues with some golden tests, can you please help me fix these issues or if you have already merged a fix for the same on 24.07 can you please give me the PR I'll backport it
```failed_tests=[flow_with_llm_refiner,process_files_msword,process_files_msword,process_files_rtf,process_files_excel,model-service,msft_read_lite,process_files_ocr_flags,csv-html-conversion]```
cc: @jayapandian.ponraj
cc: @Gauti @Balaram on conversion service changes done for 24.07
Can you please backport or list out the PR's I'll add it to my branch or if possible can you please merge the changes to this working branch `baseimage-infra3356-ubuntu-upgrade`
Hi @Parvez, Here is the PR to update the golden folder:- https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/60518

These tests are still failing any idea who can help here
```['flow_with_llm_refiner', 'process_files_rtf', 'msft_read_lite', 'process_files_excel']```

Re: flow_with_llm_refiner

This test needs proper OpenAI and InstaLLM setup. If the API url and keys are not configured, this test will fail.
You can check if the openai_api_keys_secret and installm_api_keys_secret is properly configured with non-empty values to begin with. If the config is fine, feel free to send me a link to the env and Iâ€™ll take a look since @Sayd is OOO.
